title: I Need to Know What Font this Is
content:
If anyone can help I would very much appreciate it.

I need to know what font this is.  
I know two of the key aspects that define the font are:  
1. the R  
2. E  
3. M  
4. V

Thanks in advanced for any help provided.

| --- | --- |
| [Customer Service.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414223629/http:/typophile.com/files/Customer%20Service.jpg) | 841.38 KB |
author: iTypeiDesign

comments.content:
How about this one:
